__e: Yeah, it's been a fucking rough 24 hours but that's all this means.
I know things have been heavy right now, but did I do something wrong?
Some really heavy stuff went down, but... I'm still... still trying to figure out if it was just in my head like a movie or something.
Only foul words, and thereupon I will kiss thee.
Kind of cosmic, heavy stuff, and I needed to talk to you and you weren't there.
The books are too heavy-going for here.
And I know that things have been really stressful lately for her, with her hands and looking for a job and the whole Angelo and Lana thing.
I just think the past few days have been a lot for him.
Chichi said that books would make good presents for you, but they're so bulky to be carryin'.
Those are hurtful words for the man who found you starving and near death.
These things are heavier than you think.
It's just that up until a few days ago, I assumed that my husband had only dated black women, who, in my mind, were shorter and heavier than me. Of course.
I'm just saying that those two deadweight bodies are ten percent heavier than that woman. Okay?
